name: Phptasks
tagline: PHP Applications to manage a Single project when working on
body:
***

##                                        Welcome to PHPTasks
  PHPtasks is a Simple Project management software written in php and mysql. Since my beginner periods in code i always dreamt that a find a way to stop procrastination in my life so i decided to create this to keep on toes

***

##                                           Be on toes too
The Project as I really believe will help alot of people like me who always keep postponing stuff for the next time

***

###                                         Authors and Contributors
You can visit my github account here here @silaskenneth . 
###                              Support or Contact
Having trouble with openning or running the application email me at [silaskenneth1@gmail.com](mailto:silaskenneth1@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
